entry.title: Awesome Mirth Updates on May 13 - May 19, 2024
entry.content:
Mirth Extensions

  • ğŸ”§ Mirth Connect Privacy Plugin (â­17) - This plugin for Mirth Connect performs two functions to prevent exposing details of your server and Personal Data to NextGen Healthcare.

Tutorials

  • ğŸ“ Code template for TLS (â­11) - For users without the TLS plugin, this code template library uses stunnel to enable in and outbound TLS connections. It is an attempt to ease the configuration of stunnel and do it on the fly.
  • ğŸ“ Create SOAP WebService - French article to create a custom SOAP Webservice with java

entry.title: Awesome Mirth Updates on Aug 22 - Aug 28, 2022

Official Docs & Quickstarts

Mirth Extensions
